div.p: AMERICANS FOLLOW DAVE'S LEAD. >>> FINALLY TONIGHT, "FACTOR"
TIP OF THE DAY, CELEBRATING THE FOURTH OF JULY.
HERE IS WHAT I WILL AND WILL NOT DO.
I WILL EAT A NATHAN'S HOLT DOG OR TWO MAYBE.
TOAST THAT WITH A TOASTED ALMOND ICE CREAM BAR.
I WILL NOT HANDLE FIREWORKS. I WILL JUMP IN A POOL AND SWIM
LAPS. I HAD NOT SPEND MORE THAN TEN
MINUTES ON THE INTERNET. I HAD FLY THE FLAG IN FRONT OF
MY HOUSE, I WILL NOT WATCH SUBVERSIVE COME MEN STATORS.
I HAD READ "BUNKER HILL." I WILL NOT WATCH GUMBY MOVIES.
I WILL GO TO CHURCH AND I WILL VISIT MY MOTHER WHO IS A
THAT IS US FOR TONIGHT. CHECK OUR THE FACTOR WEBSITE,
